topic: Text-to-Image AI Model Research

  entities:

  proposition: Jeongho Kim and colleagues proposed StableViton for virtual try-on using latent diffusion model.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jeongho Kim|DEVELOPED|StableViton
    StableViton|TECHNIQUE|latent diffusion model
    StableViton|PURPOSE|virtual try-on

    entity-entity relationships:
    Jeongho Kim|RESEARCHER_OF|StableViton

  proposition: Yuhao Xu and team developed OOTDiffusion for controllable virtual try-on using latent diffusion.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yuhao Xu|DEVELOPED|OOTDiffusion
    OOTDiffusion|TECHNIQUE|latent diffusion
    OOTDiffusion|PURPOSE|controllable virtual try-on

    entity-entity relationships:
    Yuhao Xu|RESEARCHER_OF|OOTDiffusion

  proposition: Sensen Gao and researchers introduced RT-Attack for jailbreaking text-to-image models via random token.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Sensen Gao|DEVELOPED|RT-Attack
    RT-Attack|PURPOSE|jailbreaking text-to-image models
    RT-Attack|TECHNIQUE|random token

    entity-entity relationships:
    Sensen Gao|RESEARCHER_OF|RT-Attack

  proposition: Zhi-Yi Chin and colleagues created Prompting4Debugging to red-team text-to-image diffusion models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Zhi-Yi Chin|DEVELOPED|Prompting4Debugging
    Prompting4Debugging|PURPOSE|red-team text-to-image diffusion models

    entity-entity relationships:
    Zhi-Yi Chin|RESEARCHER_OF|Prompting4Debugging

  proposition: Yu-Lin Tsai and team investigated reliability of concept removal methods for diffusion models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yu-Lin Tsai|INVESTIGATED|concept removal methods
    Yu-Lin Tsai|RESEARCH_FOCUS|diffusion models reliability

  proposition: Yijun Yang and researchers developed MMA-Diffusion as a multimodal attack on diffusion models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yijun Yang|DEVELOPED|MMA-Diffusion
    MMA-Diffusion|TYPE|multimodal attack
    MMA-Diffusion|TARGET|diffusion models

    entity-entity relationships:
    Yijun Yang|RESEARCHER_OF|MMA-Diffusion

  proposition: Jiachen Ma and colleagues proposed a jailbreaking prompt attack against diffusion models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jiachen Ma|PROPOSED|jailbreaking prompt attack
    Jailbreaking prompt attack|TARGET|diffusion models

  proposition: Technology Review reported that text-to-image AI models can be tricked into generating disturbing images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Technology Review|REPORTED|text-to-image AI model vulnerabilities

  proposition: Le Monde highlighted concerns about AI's problematic representation of beauty.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Le Monde|HIGHLIGHTED|AI representation issues

  proposition: Liang Shi and team developed anonymization prompt learning for facial privacy-preserving text-to-image generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Liang Shi|DEVELOPED|anonymization prompt learning
    Anonymization prompt learning|PURPOSE|facial privacy-preserving text-to-image generation

  proposition: Yixin Wu and colleagues conducted membership inference attacks against text-to-image generation models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yixin Wu|CONDUCTED|membership inference attacks
    Membership inference attacks|TARGET|text-to-image generation models

  proposition: Yixin Wan and researchers surveyed bias in text-to-image generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yixin Wan|SURVEYED|bias in text-to-image generation

  proposition: Alexander Lin and team explored word-level explanations for analyzing bias in text-to-image models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Alexander Lin|EXPLORED|word-level explanations
    Word-level explanations|PURPOSE|analyzing bias in text-to-image models

  proposition: Ranjita Naik and Besmira Nushi examined social biases through text-to-image generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Ranjita Naik|EXAMINED|social biases
    Besmira Nushi|EXAMINED|social biases
    Examination|METHOD|text-to-image generation

  proposition: Hongcheng Gao and researchers evaluated robustness of text-to-image diffusion models against real-world attacks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Hongcheng Gao|EVALUATED|robustness of text-to-image diffusion models
    Evaluation|CONTEXT|real-world attacks

  proposition: Raphaël Millière studied adversarial attacks on image generation using made-up words.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Raphaël Millière|STUDIED|adversarial attacks
    Adversarial attacks|TECHNIQUE|made-up words
    Adversarial attacks|DOMAIN|image generation

  proposition: Haomin Zhuang and team conducted a pilot study of query-free adversarial attack against Stable Diffusion.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Haomin Zhuang|CONDUCTED|query-free adversarial attack pilot study
    Pilot study|TARGET|Stable Diffusion
    Adversarial attack|TYPE|query-free

    entity-entity relationships:
    Pilot study|TARGETS|Stable Diffusion
